attributes.action: give an immediate undertaking that if any government minister or member of parliament is taken to court over criminal claims for expenses then they WILL NOT be provided with legal assistance at taxpayers expense.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It would be the final betrayal and ultimate insult for taxpayers to be required to pay the legal costs of dishonourable members who have been ripping them off for years!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
